item.title: About Me
item.description: Hey! I’m Miguel, and I’m a senior associate with RMIâ€™s US Program. I focus on climate-smart policy solutions to equitably decarbonize the US transportation sector. Before RMI, I was a student at Vanderbilt University, where I earned my MS in Civil Engineering and was president of the graduate student body. My proudest work achievement so far has been leading the development of the Smarter MODES Calculator, a tool that quantifies the societal benefits of expanding clean transportation choices.
